Binary releases
================

* :google:`hosting software binary releases`

* http://gigaom.com/2013/07/09/oops-github-did-it-again-relaunches-binary-uploads-after-scuttling-them/

* https://help.github.com/articles/distributing-large-binaries

  * suggests Amazon S3+Cloudfront (not free) or SF (ugly site)


* http://blog.bintray.com/2013/05/30/google-and-github-insist-go-store-your-binaries-in-a-proper-place/

* https://bintray.com/
